title: Validate a Tour Voucher
description: A tourist arrives for a city bus tour and presents a pre-paid voucher to the agent at the departure point.

tasks.description: Scan the QR code or enter the voucher number from the customer's ticket.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent correctly captures the voucher information.

tasks.description: Validate the voucher in the system to confirm it is valid for the current tour.
tasks.expected_outcome: The system confirms the voucher is valid and has not been used before.

tasks.description: Mark the voucher as redeemed and allow the tourist to board the bus.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully redeems the voucher and confirms the tourist can proceed.
